            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><article class="article-content-component row" id="article_main_link_1">
    <div class="lg-8 md-12 sm-12 article-content-wrapper">
        <header>
            
    
    <h1 class="A-TYP48T-RW-ALL article-title">Home loving</h1>

            <div class="second-line-article-component clearfix">
                
                <div class="article-publish-date">
                    
    <span class="A-TYP16R-RW-ALL"></span>
    

                </div>
            </div>
        </header>
        <div class="article-introduction">
            <p class="A-PAR22R-RW-ALL ">
                
            </p>
        </div>
        <div class="article-content">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region">
    
    
    <div>
        <blockquote class="A-BLQ22LI-RW-ALL" id="article_content_quote_1">
            <span class="icon icon-quote-open" aria-hidden="true"></span>
            If you're a homebody, your home is truly where you'd be the happiest. But between taking care of the kids and juggling household chores, it can feel like another full-time job, with no time for you to manage your finances. Fret not, all you need is the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app (HSBC HK App). It's so handy you can cook dinner with one hand and pay bills or review your account with the other. Worried that your kids will play with your mobile phone behind your back? Just activate your Mobile Security Key and biometric authentication, and your banking activities will stay safe!
            <span class="icon icon-quote-close" aria-hidden="true"></span>
        </blockquote>
    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-IMG-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region">
    <div id="article_content_image_1" class="smart-image">
        
            
            <figure class="smart-image-figure">
                
    
    
    <picture id="article_content_image_2">
        
        
        
        <source srcset="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/woman-using-smartphone-pwsimg-2022.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg 1x, /content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/woman-using-smartphone-pwsimg-2022.jpg 2x" media="(min-width: 960px)">
        <source srcset="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/woman-using-smartphone-pwsimg-2022.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1220.1000.jpeg 1x, /content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/woman-using-smartphone-pwsimg-2022.jpg 2x" media="(min-width: 480px)">
        <source srcset="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/woman-using-smartphone-pwsimg-2022.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.490.1000.jpeg 1x, /content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/woman-using-smartphone-pwsimg-2022.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1220.1000.jpeg 2x">
        
    <img id="article_content_image_3" class="A-IMAGE-RW-ALL smart-image-img" role="img" src="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/woman-using-smartphone-pwsimg-2022.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg" alt="A lady is drinking coffee while looking at her mobile phone.">

    </picture>
    


                
            </figure>
        
    </div>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region">

    
    


<h2 class="heading A-TYP22L-RW-ALL " id="article_content_heading_1">
    11:00: All your transactions at a glance
</h2>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="article_content_richtext_1" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">No matter how busy you are, you can use the HSBC HK App to pay your household bills or make other online payments. Records of monthly statements, payees and payment amounts - it's all there on your transaction history. So you'll always have a complete picture of how much money is going out and what it's being spent on, month after month.<br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-IMG-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region">
    <div id="article_content_image_4" class="smart-image">
        
            
            <figure class="smart-image-figure">
                
    
    
    <picture id="article_content_image_5">
        
        
        
        <source srcset="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/businesswoman-checking-mobile-pwsimg-3018.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg 1x, /content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/businesswoman-checking-mobile-pwsimg-3018.jpg 2x" media="(min-width: 960px)">
        <source srcset="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/businesswoman-checking-mobile-pwsimg-3018.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1220.1000.jpeg 1x, /content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/businesswoman-checking-mobile-pwsimg-3018.jpg 2x" media="(min-width: 480px)">
        <source srcset="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/businesswoman-checking-mobile-pwsimg-3018.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.490.1000.jpeg 1x, /content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/businesswoman-checking-mobile-pwsimg-3018.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1220.1000.jpeg 2x">
        
    <img id="article_content_image_6" class="A-IMAGE-RW-ALL smart-image-img" role="img" src="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/businesswoman-checking-mobile-pwsimg-3018.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg" alt="The lady is checking the smartphone.">

    </picture>
    


                
            </figure>
        
    </div>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region">

    
    


<h2 class="heading A-TYP22L-RW-ALL " id="article_content_heading_2">
    15:00: Retrieve up to 7 years' worth of eStatements for easy record tracking
</h2>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="article_content_richtext_2" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">On the way to pick your kid up from school, you receive a push notification informing you your new eStatement has been uploaded. Just use the HSBC HK App to view it securely anytime, anywhere.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Need to check records from years ago? You can check your eStatements and eAdvice going back up to 7 years – it's just like having your own personal assistant. Another perk of using eStatement and eAdvice - you'll save a HKD20 fee per account each year<sup><a href="#1"><span aria-hidden="true">1</span><span class="visuallyhidden">1 View remark 1</span></a></sup> for going green too.</p>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-IMG-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region">
    <div id="article_content_image_7" class="smart-image">
        
            
            <figure class="smart-image-figure">
                
    
    
    <picture id="article_content_image_8">
        
        
        
        <source srcset="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/woman-holding-a-smartphone-pwsimg-2022.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg 1x, /content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/woman-holding-a-smartphone-pwsimg-2022.jpg 2x" media="(min-width: 960px)">
        <source srcset="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/woman-holding-a-smartphone-pwsimg-2022.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1220.1000.jpeg 1x, /content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/woman-holding-a-smartphone-pwsimg-2022.jpg 2x" media="(min-width: 480px)">
        <source srcset="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/woman-holding-a-smartphone-pwsimg-2022.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.490.1000.jpeg 1x, /content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/woman-holding-a-smartphone-pwsimg-2022.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1220.1000.jpeg 2x">
        
    <img id="article_content_image_9" class="A-IMAGE-RW-ALL smart-image-img" role="img" src="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/woman-holding-a-smartphone-pwsimg-2022.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg" alt="Woman use smartphone to apply for a credit card.">

    </picture>
    


                
            </figure>
        
    </div>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region">

    
    


<h2 class="heading A-TYP22L-RW-ALL " id="article_content_heading_3">
    01:00: Tap and apply for an HSBC Personal Instalment Loan or credit card
</h2>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="article_content_richtext_3" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">It's late at night, but you're still up thinking about the family budget. Home renovations, family vacations... these are all things that require cash flow. So you decide to apply for an extra credit card or a personal instalment loan. You whip out your mobile phone, open the HSBC HK App, and voila, you'll be able to get what you need done really quickly and head off to bed.<br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region">

    
    


<h2 class="heading A-TYP22L-RW-ALL " id="article_content_heading_4">
    Tips
</h2>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="article_content_richtext_4" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Guard your account with your Mobile Security Key</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">With the new Mobile Security Key function, you can log on to the HSBC HK App and online banking seamlessly. Your Mobile Security Key is tethered to only 1 authorised device, so everything you do is extra secure.</p>
</div></div>

</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="article_content_richtext_6" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">

<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li><a id="1"></a>A Paper Statement Service Annual Fee of HKD20 will be charged to each account if you request more than two paper statements per year for your Personal Banking Hong Kong Dollar Current, SuperEase, HSBC Premier, HSBC One, Personal Integrated Account, University Student, Cash Card, Renminbi Savings, Hong Kong Dollar Statement Savings, CombiNations Statement Savings or Foreign Currency Current accounts. This fee is waived for recipients of the Comprehensive Social Security Allowance and Disability Allowance, customers with physical or visual impairment and customers aged under 18 or over 65. </li> 
</ol>
</div></div>
